page.title: 16Places of interest
page.content: There are no great historic houses, no statues, no magnificent gardens to view, this is an area of natural interest where people can have a quiet time getting back to nature. Picnics and walks and drives down narrow Devon lanes with high hedges on both sides are the reason people visit the area. Many people simply drive the road from Colyton to Honiton regularly and become completely oblivious to the surrounding beauty. On the other hand the area appears to be attracting more visitors each year simply to spend a few days living on the farm and enjoying the simple uncomplicated life.
